mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, BIRTHDATE, GENDER, PHONE_NUMBER, MARKETING_CONSENT, ACCOUNT_CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{marketingConsent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = #{password}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, BIRTHDATE = #{birthdate}, GENDER = #{gender}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber}, MARKETING_CONSENT = #{marketingConsent}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
